page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE 2
page.content: The day I have chosen is Friday. At 7.30am my mum and dad get up. My dad takes the dog for a walk. I get up at 7.50am and my sister gets up at 8.00am. My mum gets my breakfast and sandwiches ready. My dad has a quick breakfast and goes to play golf with his friend. I set off for the bus at 8.20am. My sister walks up to the little school at 8.45am. My mum cleans the house. At dinner-time .... My mum has a snack. My dad has a sandwich at the pub with his golf friends. I have sandwiches and so does our Kate. My dad comes back for his work and then at 4.00pm I come home. Kate has been home since 3.30pm. Kate, mum and I have our tea around 5.00pm.
